name: Twot Tot and the Mansion of Madness
description:
Twot Tot and the Mansion of Madness is a multi-screen platform game where you have to collect items and use them solve puzzles.

Twot Tot is trapped in the Mansion of Madness and you have to help him escape. To be able to escape Twot has to befriend the inmates of the mansion. You will often find that the inmates block Twots way and that they demand payment for passage, what kind of payment they want varies from inmate to inmate. When you explore the mansion you will encounter many items which can be used to solve the problems Twot Tot encounters, but you can only carry two at a time and sometimes two or more items has to be combined to solve a problem. The place is infested with bugs which must be avoided, if they hit Twot he loses one life and he's only got seven. In some room you will find poems and anagrams and these can give you useful information if they are solved.
